short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you watch news and information for crytocurrency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are a busy person, this extension can help you. This extension can provide you with news and information about cryptocurrencies quickly and comfortably.
